# GitHub Actions Workflows

This directory contains GitHub Actions workflows for CI/CD.

## Available Workflows

- **`pr-build-check.yml`** - Builds and validates the Next.js web app on pull requests
- **`build-android-apk.yml`** - Builds Android APK using EAS Build

## Documentation

For detailed documentation, see:

- [CI/CD Documentation](../../docs/ci-cd/)
  - [Workflows Overview](../../docs/ci-cd/workflows-README.md)
  - [Building Android APK](../../docs/ci-cd/BUILD_APK.md)
